title: Life in the lowlands: the Netherlands
brief_description: Shows life in the polda lands of Holland with emphasis on the theme of man’s eternal struggle against nature. Demonstrates how dams and dikes are constructed and shows typical characteristics of the land; windmills, modes of transport, industries and life on the dairy farm.
